title: Literary Argument - Character Out of Place

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how this experience of feeling out of place affects the character and contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Do not merely summarize the plot.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how this experience of feeling out of place affects the character and contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. Do not merely summarize the plot.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
